name: Off Road Snow Hill Climb Bus
name_original: Off Road Snow Hill Climb Bus
description:
Off Road Snow Hill Climb Bus is a challenging game and you can test your driving skills in risky and dangerous conditions and difficult snowy paths. This game is filled with thrill and full of adventure of off road driving on mountains and you will definitely enjoy with attractive paths and locations.
Features:

Amazing Hill Station and with heavy snow 3D Graphics.

Smooth Steering, Brakes and Drifting

Explore city and hilly with heavy snow

Smooth touch controls for easy driving
